.method public static hidebysig class System.Numerics.Tensors.CompressedSparseTensor`1<!!T> ToCompressedSparseTensor<T>(class System.Array array, bool reverseStride) cil managed
static member ToCompressedSparseTensor : Array * bool -> System.Numerics.Tensors.CompressedSparseTensor<'T>

Docs.typeparam: Type contained in the to copy to the .
Docs.param: The array to create a from.

(default) to indicate that the first dimension is most major (farthest apart) and the last dimension is most minor (closest together): akin to row-major in a rank-2 tensor. to indicate that the last dimension is most major (farthest apart) and the first dimension is most minor (closest together): akin to column-major in a rank-2 tensor.
Docs.summary: Creates a copy of this n-dimensional as a .
Docs.returns: A n-dimensional with the same dimensions and content as .
